category.text: $course$/uu-variance-800-en-wooclap/Inferential Statistics/Parametric Techniques/t-test/Independent samples means, Descriptive statistics/Summary Statistics/Measures of Spread/Variance

questiontext.text:
Isa wishes to compare the prices of apartments in two neighboring towns using a significance level of 5%. She takes a random sample of 12 apartments in town A and calculates the average price of these apartments (M = 850, SD = 85). She repeats this for 15 apartments in town B (M = 825, SD = 75).

What is the value of the pooled estimate of the population variance?
